title: [LOVE] Ep. 172 How to Embody a Healthy Sex Life w/ Eva Clay
description:

What makes your erotic mind turn on?

Â 

Tune in to this steamy episode for a conversation all about having a healthy libido.Â  Ash talks with clinical sexologist and psychologist Eva Clay to dive deep into sexuality and passion in relationships.

Â 

Whether you are single and not interested in dating or you are struggling to keep the sexual desire alive in your relationship, Eva shares actionable tips to build your libido. There is one major impact on libido, be sure to listen in to learn how to better manage this in your life. Know that low libido isnâ€™t wrong, it is simply telling you something.Â 

Â 

Eva walks through how to turn your sex life from an athletic event into a creative and passionate experience, ways to naturally boost your estrogen levels, and how to connect to your eroticism. Donâ€™t forget to stick around for the post-episode notes with Ash where she gets personal and shares her added insight into sexuality.

Â 

In This Episode, You Will Learn:

  1. Connection between sex and success in all aspects of life.
  2. Causes of libido shift and how to build a stronger desire for passion in your life.
  3. How to keep a long-term sexual connection in your relationship.
  4. Ways to shift the conversation of sex from faux pas to curious and comfortable.
  5. How to ask for what you want from an empowered place.

Â
